decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site Location Plan, 17/61-65/CRH/101, 17/61-65/CRH/102. Received 26/06/2017. 17/61-65/CRH/103/A. Received 11/09/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - No machinery shall be operated, no process shall be carried out and no deliveries taken at or despatched from the site outside the following times 9 am to 9 pm nor at any time on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The industrial use of the premises shall be limited to the cleaning and preparation of tableware in association with the catering business that stores its equipment and tableware at the premises and for no other purpose.
description: Change of use from a vehicle repair garage to a storage facility for a catering business, including facilities for washing tableware and cooking equipment and increase in part of roof height and alterations to fenestration.
